application.doc: Setting parameters for a single endpoint

param.name: id
param.doc: The unique id of the endpoint to set parameters for. This is a combination of the interface and address UUID, separated by a '.' character, followed by ':' and the port number. To use the DHCP address on an adapter, replace the address UUID with either "dhcp.ipv4" for the IPv4 DHCP address or "dhcp.ipv6" for the IPv6 DHCP address.

method.name: PUT
method.id: Set parameters for a single endpoint
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the endpoint's resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: port
param.doc: The new port the endpoint will listen on.

param.name: secure
param.doc: Indicates whether the endpoint will use SSL.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
